error.noHost: Host name cannot be empty. (That's the address of the server you're connecting to.)
error.noPort: Port number cannot be empty. (That's the 4-5 digits at the end of the server address, often 38281.)
error.portOutOfRange: Port should be a number from 1 to 65535 (most likely 38281).
error.noSlot: Slot name cannot be empty. (That's your name on your YAML configuration file.)
error.InvalidSlot: No player ":name" is listed for this server instance.
error.InvalidGame: Player ":name" is not listed as a Bumper Stickers slot.
error.IncompatibleVersion: The server is expecting a newer version of the game. Please ensure you're running the latest version.
error.InvalidItemsHandling: Please report a bug stating that an "InvalidItemsHandling" error was received.
